sentences.sContent: They finally managed to throw off the shackles of colonialism.
sentences.sCn: 他们终于挣脱了殖民主义的枷锁。

trans.tranCn: 手铐, 脚镣, 桎梏, 束缚物
trans.tranOther: one of a pair of metal rings joined by a chain that are used for fastening together a prisoner’s hands or feet, so that they cannot move easily or escape
